Original: Thank you for accepting my request.
My name is Barbule... I research
monsters.
[Page]
I'd like you to investigate a wall of
ice with specimens preserved within
it, seen in the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0].
[Page]
If you can, find out the reasons why
such an ice wall formed.
[Page]
It seems to be somewhere in the
[Color:5]southeast[Color:0]... A bit of it juts out,
which may help you find it.
[Page]
If I could, I'd go there myself, but
I'm pretty sure it would set off all
my allergies.
[Page]
Oh yes, and I don't know if it's
related, but a monster has been seen
nearby as well. So be careful...
Translation: Thank you for accepting my request.
My name is Barbule... I research
monsters.
[Page]
I'd like you to investigate a wall of
ice with specimens preserved within
it, seen in the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0].
[Page]
If you can, find out the reasons why
such an ice wall formed.
[Page]
It seems to be somewhere in the

[Page]
If I could, I'd go there myself, but
I'm pretty sure it would set off all
my allergies.
[Page]
Oh yes, and I don't know if it's
related, but a monster has been seen
nearby as well. So be careful...

Original: Look for the ice wall rumored to be
in the [Color:5]southeast[Color:0] area of the [Color:5]Sacred
Mountains[Color:0] and find out how it formed.
[Page]
I don't know where in the southeast
it is, though... Finding that out is
part of your job.
Translation: Look for the ice wall rumored to be
in the [Color:5]southeast[Color:0] area of the [Color:5]Sacred
Mountains[Color:0] and find out how it formed.
[Page]
I don't know where in the southeast
it is, though... Finding that out is
part of your job.

Original: Ah, you're back. Well? Did you find
out how the ice wall was formed?
Translation: Ah, you're back. Well? Did you find
out how the ice wall was formed?

Original: Just as I thought! The [Enemy1:130]
appeared while you were investigating
the ice wall, didn't it?
[Page]
Which means the animals inside the
ice were a trap to lure its prey...
Aha! This is an incredible discovery!
[Page]
I suspected that ice wall had been
made by monsters, but I lacked any
data to confirm my hypothesis.
[Page]
That's why I used you as a control
group, and--Hey! D-Don't get angry!
I did warn you about the monster!
[Page]
Anyway, I'm satisfied. Thank you for
your cooperation. You'll find your
reward with Ms. Kirtida.
[Page]
And that [Enemy1:130]... I doubt it's
the only one, given the size of the
wall, if you wish to fight it again.
Translation: Just as I thought! The [Enemy1:130]
appeared while you were investigating
the ice wall, didn't it?
[Page]
Which means the animals inside the
ice were a trap to lure its prey...
Aha! This is an incredible discovery!
[Page]
I suspected that ice wall had been
made by monsters, but I lacked any
data to confirm my hypothesis.
[Page]
That's why I used you as a control
group, and--Hey! D-Don't get angry!
I did warn you about the monster!
[Page]
Anyway, I'm satisfied. Thank you for
your cooperation. You'll find your
reward with Ms. Kirtida.
[Page]
And that [Enemy1:130]... I doubt it's
the only one, given the size of the
wall, if you wish to fight it again.

Original: I underestimated how intelligent those
monsters can be. Was it a mutation of
the [Enemy1:130]'s, or...?
[Page]
Oh, you're still here? I left you a
sizable reward on the assumption of
a fierce battle, so please, take it.
Translation: I underestimated how intelligent those
monsters can be. Was it a mutation of
the [Enemy1:130]'s, or...?
[Page]
